translations: （Scrivener）人名；（英）斯克里夫纳；（法）斯克里韦内

sentences.sentence: He was a simple - looking lawyer's clerk, elevated to the extraordinary dignity of a provincial scrivener .
sentences.translation: 他虽然只不过是一个平庸的律师事务所里的职员， 但却故意装出一副乡下律师所特有的那种庄严的神气。

sentences.sentence: Scrivener is a word processing app designed for writers with a unqiue interface and tool set focused on ‘ generating content’ rather than simply allowing for content to be written.
sentences.translation: Scrivener是一个为作家设计的码字工具，有着独特的界面和工具，致力于“生成内容”而不是简单的录入内容。

sentences.sentence: Over on the Literature &Latte message boards – the official support hub for Scrivener – a hardy bunch of folks have packaged up an unofficial version for Linux users which doesn’t require wine.
sentences.translation: 在 Literature &Latte message boards网站 –Scrivener的官网 – 点击 packaged up an unofficial version进入不需要Wine的linux页面。
